label: AB_tP4_129_a_c-001
title: Litharge (tetragonal PbO, $B10$) Structure
comments:
This is the tetragonal room temperature form reported by (Boher, 1985), with data taken at 77.6K. They claim a transformation to the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oC8_67_a_g-002}{orthorhombic $\alpha$-PbO phase} below 77K. See the discuss of the problems with this transition on the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oC8_67_a_g-002}{$\alpha$-PbO} page. 
  This structure is the binary version of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_tP4_129_ac-001}{$A_{d}$ ($\beta$-Np) structure}.
